channel.title: My Projects and Stuff im interested in :3
channel.description: Recent content on My Projects and Stuff im interested in :3

item.title: About
item.description:
About Grimtail’s World and me - Grimtail

Grimtail | 29 years old | C# Backend Developer | Cloud Solutions | Student

What I Do

  • Developing scalable backend systems in C#
  • Developing and optimizing cloud and database-driven solutions
  • Always exploring new technologies & best practices

What Interests Me:

  • Natural sciences – Physics, chemistry, and how the world works
  • Electronics, tinkering and DIY – Hands-on projects, circuits, and engineering
  • 3D printing – Designing, prototyping, and bringing ideas to life
  • Programming – Exploring the world of 0 and 1 from top-level to bare metal
  • Cooking & baking – Precision, creativity, and the science of flavors
  • Interdisciplinary learning – Connecting fields for deeper understanding Always Curious, Always Learning I enjoy tackling complex problems, learning across disciplines, and improving my skills—whether in software development, science, or the kitchen.

Let’s connect and share ideas! Contact me

item.title: Plastic Pyrolysis
item.description: Transforming plastic into fuel sounds like science fiction, but pyrolysis is already making it a reality!

item.title: QuickFix: Ceramic Capacitor on my Motherboard
item.description: When a tiny capacitor fails spectacularly, does it mean the end of your motherboard? Not if you’re ready to fix it yourself!

item.title: Copperplating
item.description: Imagine turning ordinary objects into gleaming copper creations. The process is simpler than you expect – and the results are stunning!

item.title: Wonder of Crystals: Exploring the Wonders of Growth and Formation
item.description: Explore the mesmerizing world of crystal growth and see how simple chemical substances can create stunning natural patterns.
